attributes.action: Racial segregation; Evict Extremist Tennants for a better balance
attributes.additional_details:
After listening to Radio 4 the other day, I was shocked and angered to hear that there are segments in the UK which are prodominently  Muslem in culture and have even taken it to the next level by declaring "You are entering a Shites zone". This defies UK laws and culture and everything this country stands for.
Please balance out our communities by reducing the amount of Muslems allowed to live in one area.
